mod.name: Default Config
mod.description: The Default Config that comes with XVM

mod.updateComment: 2016-06-03: changed clock from 24 hour to 12 hour format with am/pm marker. Disabled blocking of stock WoT damage log. Disabled xvm eff in battle.
mod.description: Config by Willster419. Origionaly based on stock xvm config.@Includes an hp pool and minimap hp circles

mod.name: OMC XVM Config
mod.description: OMC XVM Config

config.name: Enable Quick Color Marker (Quickstat)
config.description: from left to right: WN8, EFF, global winrate, winrate on the current tank

mod.name: Clan Icons
mod.description: all clan icons from 04/02/2017

config.name: 6th sense - Icon Duration
config.description: Configure how long the 6th sense icon stays on your screen

config.name: Information Label for Missions (Mission Tracker)
config.description: This label positioned under the left PlayersPanel shows you many informations you need for missions or for your daily games too. @Examples for that are your damage, damage of your platoon members, damage of you and your platoon members together, number of enemys you spotted, number of critical hits you made, number of enemys your complete platoon killed, damage through reconnaissance and chain destruction, damage through spotting only, damage through chain destruction only, damage you got, hits you got and damage you blocked. @@Information Label for Missions by MarsOne: http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/340002-09151-omc-modpack-installer-mit-bild-video-vorschau-letztes-update-siehe-wwwodemmortiscom/page__st__4980__pid__13912513#entry13912513

config.name: Scoreboard
config.description: Configure the scoreboard (the topmost interface component showing both teams alive or dead tanks)

config.name: Hitlog
config.description: Toggle the xvm hitlog (Shows a log of your total damage for the duration of the game)

config.name: Total HP
config.description: Shows the total combined hp of each team

config.name: WN8 Comparison
config.description: Shows the total WN8 values of each team

config.name: High Caliber Tracker
config.description: Shows how much damage you need to do to get high caliber

config.name: Win Chance [Disabled by XVM]
config.description: Show the percent chance of winning in the battle when you press tab

config.name: Damage Log
config.description: Show the xvm damage log (displays to right of damage panel (lower left)

config.name: Enable toggling of client default damagelog from game settings
config.description: Enabling this will allow you to configify the ingame damagelog and hitlog settings from the client settings window

config.name: Last Hit Announcer
config.description: Will display a message of who just shot you and for how much

config.name: Vehicle On Fire Announcer
config.description: Visual (and audio, if enabled) notification if you vehicle is on fire.@In case the fire indicator in your vehicle isn't enough

config.name: Total Efficiency
config.description: Shows spotting damage, assistance damage, stun damage, etc.

config.name: Damage Panel Repair Timers
config.description: Shows a number in the picture of the damaged modules in the players panel

mod.name: Battle Results modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Show the tier of the battle (max tier)@also change which results page is displayed first when you enter the garage from the battle@page 1 is battle summary@page 2 is teams score@page 3 is your detailed battle stats

mod.name: Tank Carousel base modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Choose how many tank rows are displayed in your garage.@also enable or disable the xvm garage

config.name: Show cell, hide total used slots
Show cell, show total used slots
Cell Content
config.description: Change the content inside the tank cells

config.name: From Prebuilt Config Selection
config.description: Use the carousel cell settings from the xvm config you selected in the XVM prebuilt configs tab

config.name: 1.0 Scale
config.description: Normal size of the carousel

config.name: 0.8 scale
config.description: Reduce the size of the carousel overall by a factor of 0.8

config.name: 0.6 scale
config.description: Reduce the size of the carousel overall by a factor of 0.6

config.name: 1.0 Scale
config.description: Normal carousell cell size

config.name: 0.8 Scale
config.description: Reduce the size of the carousel overall by a factor of 0.8

config.name: Starting Position
config.description: Choose with which Players Panel position you will start.

config.name: HP Bars
config.description: Choose which HP bars you want to use

mod.name: Statistics color step modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Choose which color scale you use to display player's tank stats

config.name: Clock
config.description: Enable or disable the clock in the garage. Also select 12 or 24 hour clock

config.name: Time Format
config.description: change the time format

config.name: Change Color to Blue
config.description: Changes the color of the clock to Blue with a white shadow.

config.name: Gold Locker
config.description: Prevent you from using gold in your garage

config.name: Free XP Locker
config.description: Prevent you from using free xp in your garage

config.name: Set Default Currency
config.description: Change the default form of currency for purchasing shells, consumables, etc.

config.name: Tech Tree free XP convert option
config.description: Enable an option where, when trying to research a module or tank, if you do not have enough xp, it will present you with a window to convert enough free xp to research the item

config.name: Crew Auto-return
config.description: Automatically return your crew between tanks

config.name: Removable equipment auto-return
config.description: automatically return removable equipment

config.name: Block vehicle if ammo is lower than...
config.description: Prevent you from entering a battle if you vehicle is low on ammo

config.name: Server Ping
config.description: Shows the ping delay (in ms) of the server(s)

config.name: Server Populations
config.description: Display number of people on the server

mod.name: Marker modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Toggle the xvm markers in the game. Disabling them will enable the configurations in the game

config.name: Auto-login
config.description: Automatiacly log into the game

config.name: Hide the old replay confirmation window
config.description: Will not ask you if you want to confirm loading an old version replay. Will load it automaticly.

config.name: Show server ping
config.description: Show server pings from the login screen

config.name: Save last server
config.description: Save the last server that you logged into

config.name: Show server populations
config.description: Show the servers population in the login screen

config.description: Toggle the xvm minimap status.

config.name: Nikodemsky
config.description: Left shield - nationality: @Yellow - UK; Light Green - USA; Red - USSR; Gray - Germany; Blue - France; Green - China; White - Japan; Navy blue - Czechoslovakia; Teal - Sweden @Icon Color - type of tank: Bronze - Heavy Tank; Green - Medium Tank; Light bronze - Light Tank; Red - SPG; Blue - Tank Destroyer @Right numbers - Armor points(Front/Side/Back) @Yellow Star - Premium indicator

mod.description: Keeps a list of who shot you and for how much. In OMC config, press right alt to see the player name.@XFT Config Website:@http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/338561-0915-xft-integrated-damagelogs-v022a-30-05-2016/

XFT config with hitlog on top (xvm needed for hitlog)

mod.name: Damagelog by bionick with custom panel
mod.description: Keeps a list of who shot you and for how much. Includes a custom damage panel

mod.name: Zoom Out Config (meters)
mod.description: How far you can zoom out in arcade mode in meters@increase scroll speed - your mouse wheel will be faster to scroll@disable gun shake - your aim will not shake when you are hit

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - Server Reticle (pmod)
mod.description: Shows where the server thinks you are aiming. Server crosshair mustbe enabled in game settings.

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - Penetration ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) Indicator (pmod)
mod.description: Shows wether or not you can penetrate an enemy, factoring in armor angles and normalization, in the form@ avg_gun_penetration/enemy_effective_armor

mod.name: Zoom modifications - zoom in (pmod)
mod.description: Allows you to change the ammount that you can zoom in.@Default zoom changes the first zoom in when you go to sniper mode@td brake allows you to change wether the tank moves when you point your gun out of gun range

mod.name: Battle Assistant
mod.description: TO USE THIS MOD YOU MUST ACTIVATE (PURCHASE OR AD SUPPORTED) HERE:http://armorinspector.com/en/battleassistant @Enables an isometric view from Arty.

mod.name: ExtraAimInfo
mod.description: arty only config only shows@-aimtime@-accuracy@-flight time@old style places it where it was when the mod first came out

mod.name: Autoaim indication
mod.updateComment: Latest update locks onto a target when manually highlighted, so it is legal now
mod.description: kaeptn configs@http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/441413-0917-autoaim-indicationaddins-no-proximity-snapping-for-autoaim-but/page__st__1580__pid__13686506#entry13686506

config.name: lock shell travel distance when enemy dissapeared add-on

mod.name: Number Indicator of Armor Penetration ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) (not PMOD)
mod.description: Shows a number of chance of penetration. The number is calculated by (enemy_effective_armor-gun_average_penetration).@Negative number means likely to bounce.@Positive number means likely to pierce.

mod.name: SafeShot
mod.updateComment: Disabled "block wasted shot" because it restricts too much
mod.description: legal info@http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/599621-wg-support-safeshot-is-illegal/page__st__20__pid__13403197#entry13403197@prevents you from shooting your gun to hit allies/dead tanks/etc.

config.name: send team damage message in chat

mod.name: BalCalcMod
mod.description: The mod is designed to remedy the situation where it is impossible to aim above the hill. (Overshooting)

mod.name: Wide Border of Maps
mod.description: Mod is made to help people with color blindness. The line, that indicates the border of maps, is expanded to the edges of the map. Now don't notice her is almost impossible. "Full" and "Light" differ only in the degree of compressibility. @WIDE - the border of maps is expanded to the edges of the map. INTENSIVE - the border of maps is made in the thickness of 20 pixels (on the standard = 1 pixel).@GRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 10x10. EXTRAGRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 50x50.@COMMAND - into the version "GRID" added the big numbering squares card. SPG - into the version "GRID" added the small numbering squares card.

mod.name: 15m Spot Circle
mod.description: Shows a 15m Circle around your tank. Its the minimum distance behind bushes if you are shooting you stay hidden. In the sniper scope ring is not displayed.

mod.name: Crew Skill Informer
mod.description: Crew Skill Informer is WoT mod to visualize crews skills and perks meanwhile the battle. Activate it by pressing backspace

mod.name: Marking Industructable Structures
mod.description: Shows which structures can not be destroyed

mod.name: Gold Visibility Mod by lgfrbcsgo
mod.description: This mod adds a short sparkling effect to penetrating APCR/HEAT hits. Not only will you be able to tell if an enemy tank is shooting gold rounds at your allied tanks (or at you), but also if one of your allies is a gold spammer. This information will help you determining whether to engage or not to engage an enemy.

mod.name: Arty Log Extended by OldSkool
mod.description: Shows how much damage arty actually causes vs. other tanks that damage you

mod.name: TessuMod, WOT/Teamspeak integration
mod.description: YOU MUST ACTIVATE THE MOD IN TEAMSPEAK. Instructions here: http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/433614-09171-tessumod-wotteamspeak-integration-mod-v0613-26032017/#topmost @A modification for integrating TeamSpeak into Garage and Battle.

mod.name: SpotMessanger
mod.description: Sends a chat message that you are spotted in a grid square, along with the "Help!" command

mod.name: Inbattle current rating calculation by Ekspoint
mod.description: Shows your current stats ingame. Live updates in game. Downloads latest expected values from the internet.@DIFF = Difference between the damage you've done and the average damage expected for the tank you're in. @EFF = Efficiency is a rating formula that calculates damage dealt,winrate,kills,cap points,cap defense points.

config.name: JVT Techtree Mod
config.description: Mainfeatures: @- 11 different Layout options (8 vertical, 3 horizontal) @- 5 graphic options @- Show hidden, removed Premium and special tanks in techtree @- Enjoy over 490 tanks in your techtree @- Nice, centered nations button bar @- Compatiblity with all screen resolutions @- In-game UI mod settings (press F8 key for Changes, press F7 key for reloading Data base) @- Allows preview and tank compare features for all tanks in game @@Because there are different options, you can style the Techtree using different combinations.

mod.name: ADU Active Dossier Uploader PlugIns
mod.description: download the main program at the developer side@@vBAddict WoT Performance Analyzer can analyze your World of Tanks Profile with the information stored locally in your Dossier cache file. Dossier files contain a summary of all of your tanks you have ever played.@vBAddict will help you to keep track on your overall battle performance WN7/WN8 efficiency, accuracy, damage ratio, damage dealt, damage assisted (radio + track), damage taken, damage per kill, experience, average battle time, mileage per map, credits and experience per minute, Platoon statistics, Mastery Badges, Marks of Excellence and even more.

mod.name: Crew sounds
mod.updateComment: Filzi:@updated to 0.9.19.0.2 thx Budyx69 @ElkAFV:@v1.0 - updated to 0.9.19.0.1@Grandpas:@v4.19.17 - updated to 0.9.18.0@Relhax:@Version 18@MLG Mod:@@Sounds for Crew voices:@@Julie:@updated by niserius@Monty Python:@@Romanian:@updated by niserius
mod.description: Filzi:@only german Crew Sounds@ElkAFV:@Change the default voice gender of all crews to female@Grandpas:@Audio mod with various voices from@Duke Nukem, Team Fortress, Left 4 Dead, Minnions@and some female voices, gun reloaded notification and sixth sense sound.@Relhax:@Replaces all crew sounds with hilarious out-of-context sound bytes from people of the RELIC gaming community@MLG Mod:@Must have sound crew language set to "standard"@MLG EVERYWHERE@Also includes awesome visuals.@Sounds for Crew voices:@Mutes all crew sounds and replaces them with sounds@Julie:@Must have sound crew language set to "standard"@Monty Python:@Must have sound crew language set to "standard"@Romanian:@Must have sound crew language set to "standard"
